title: Stained

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Vulture. If they would be attacked, you instead steal the kill, attacking them first. You Clean the target. Killers are not informed you Vultured their kill.
- At night, instead you may Wipe. You clean all your Visitors if they die tonight.
- Cleanse (x2 use): Target a player. If they kill someone tonight, you attack and Clean them, as well as cleaning their last victim (even if their role was already revealed in the graveyard).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You move in unnatural ways, bypassing good Protective abilities such as Traps and Bodyguards. However, if you avoid a Protective ability, the player who set it is aware that their ability was ignored by the Stained (4341).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4341
*The infection had changed him. His sensitivity to light prevented him from showing his skin; he wore a metal bucket with a gash in it for an eye-hole. The office building he roamed wasn't inhabited anymore - it had been abandoned decades ago - but he stayed to to do his janitorial duties. No one would enter during cleaning hours.*
